title: Commercial Sales Manager
description: The Commercial Sales Manager is responsible for driving the commercial sales within their AutoZone location. The CSM develops and maintains positive relationships with commercial customers by managing the acquisition and delivery of products, providing ongoing customer service, and maintaining expert knowledge on parts and inventory. The CSM exceeds customer's expectation by delivering WOW Customer Service to all AZ Commercial accounts by Living the Pledge everyday. Responsibilities - Achieve g…

title: Pharmacy Technician
description: Job Description Job Description Job Title: Pharmacy Technician Shift: First Shift Hours: 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM, Monday through Friday (with every other weekend required) Job Description: As a Pharmacy Technician, you will work under the direct supervision of a Registered Pharmacist to fill prescriptions and prepare IVs.
